stories.title: Learning from grad student chem death (2008)

stories.text: For stuff like cables, adapters, and general electronic stuff, all I see on Amazon all I see are random made in China brands with a suspicious amount of 5 star reviews. Are stores like Best Buy/Micro Center or purchasing direct from Apple/Microsoft/Sony/etc. the best bet, or are there still some high quality brands to be found on Amazon and other stores.
stories.title: Ask HN: Where do you buy electronic cables/wires/peripherals
Tailscale is responsible for 40% of my battery usage
Astropy – a community Python library for Astronomy

stories.text:
Hi HN,

I've been working on this platform where I'm trying to help first-time founders and indie hackers kickstart their journey by getting funded for their idea(s) in the form of a "domain-name round funding".

I would love to know your thoughts on this concept & whether this would be of any value to you?

Here's the link to the platform: https://buymeadomain.com
stories.title: Can an idea-stage fundraise motivate the founder to take on further challenges?
